title: I got a punishment/strike for something I didn't do?
body:
Today I got this:
"Your Content Has Been Removed
From: Riot Games
Greetings Summoner!

I am removing the off-topic posts pertaining to female champions being "knocked up" from the below thread for being off-topic and disruptive to the discussion. This isn't a punishment, but please avoid derailing threads with off-topic discussions.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/4XZGuihH-whats-the-point-of-merc-treads-if-everything-is-a-knockup

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the Moderation Discord here.

-DTN

I didn't ever post this comment. I vaguely remember looking at the thread, but I never posted anything to it. Can this please be looked at?
